name: BeerWisdom
0:
”Alexa open Beer Wisdom”
”Alexa ask Beer Wisdom”
”Alexa ask Beer Wisdom for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beer wisdom
des: This skill plays a random fact in various categories of beer, including: BJCP beer styles descriptions, beer ingredients, hops, yeast, grains, breweries, random info, historical info, and more! Just open the skill to get a random fact! I will be adding more facts weekly!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
